params._ref: The user-defined reference (such as an index or url) that the Registry entry will point to.
params._subdomain: The subdomain that will be utilized to reference the current Registry entry.

params._registry: The Registry address that the RegistryConroller will manage.
params._registryToken: The RegistryToken address that the RegistryController will manage.

params._newRef: The new reference value to be updated in the Registry entry.
params._subdomain: The subdomain of the Registry entry to be updated.

params._newRef: The new reference value to be updated to.

params._newStakePrice: The new stake price to be used by the registry.

createRegistryEntry(string,string).notice: Creates a new entry within a Registry.

init(address,address).notice: Initializes a new RegistryController after construction.

setRegistryEntryRef(string,string).notice: Updates a Registry entries reference value.

setStakePrice(uint256).notice: Sets a new stake price for a Registry's RegistryToken.
